content: is someone else having issues with mention counts?
I see I have an unread mention, go to mentions and read it and it doesn't go out until I end reading it through the topic in which that message is included
something started to work weird related to notifications

I have had this issue with zulip-terminal. Seems to have something to do with using multiple clients. (zulip-terminal and the android app in this case) https://github.com/zulip/zulip-terminal/issues/1029
I just have 0 expectations of Zulip not being buggy on mobile lol
in my case it's just using it in the browser
it suddenly started to happen last week
doesn't happen with private messages, only with mentions
